name: Sampada Santosh Pavate
title: Professional Developer
shortBio:
Mid-level full-stack developer with strong experience modernizing web applications and automating deployment pipelines. Delivered a site migration
from Jekyll to Next.js 14 with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Vercel CI/CD, and automated Magento Open Source installation on Ubuntu using Ansible,
cutting deployment time by 75%. Skilled in building responsive UIs, integrating secure payment gateways, and applying SEO best practices to boost
organic traffic. Ready to apply this blend of front-end, back-end, and DevOps expertise to drive efficient, high-quality product delivery.
